delay.warningText: Scheduled actions will only be executed if the trigger is available again before the remaining time expires.

sequence.delayActionExplainsDescription: Use delays to add defined periods of inactivity in your flow. Depending on your preferences these periods can be just a few minutes long or last a couple of months.
sequence.labelChangingAction: Changing this action will have an immediate effect on scheduled delayed actions.
sequence.labelChangingCondition: Changing this condition will have an immediate effect on scheduled delayed conditions.
sequence.labelChangingDelay: Editing this delay will not affect scheduled delays.
sequence.labelDeletingDelay: Deleting this delay will cancel all related scheduled delayed actions and conditions.
sequence.warningText: There are actions scheduled for this flow. Any changes to this flow will not affect actions that are already scheduled.
This flow contains delayed actions. If you want to delete this flow, please settle all delayed actions beforehand.

modal.customTimeInvalid: Does not match required format MM:WW:DD:hh.
modal.helpTextCustomTime:
Custom delay durations have to be entered exactly in the following format (months):(weeks):(days):(hours).
Example: 01:03:00:00 will delay your flow for one month and three weeks.

modal.textConfirmChangeTrigger: This flow contains scheduled actions. Changing the trigger will reset the flow and remove all scheduled actions.

downloadModal.description:
This flow file will include all sequences and the configurations used in its conditions and actions. When uploaded to a foreign system, missing data will be created.

References to categories, products and properties can be excluded from the flow file. When uploaded to a foreign system, these missing references will have to be reassigned.
downloadModal.title: Download flow

The configuration of some Warehouse groups is ignored because no rule is assigned. Without a rule, your Warehouse group has no responsibility and is not functional.
Assign a rule or create a new rule via the Rule Builder to give your groups responsibility.

swag-b2b-features.shoppingListDescription: Your customers can  gather products that they need to access frequently or order at a later time.

swag-customer-classification.alertPageIntroduction: Create classifications of customers based on their order data and add these to the customers as tags.
swag-customer-classification.helpTextGenerateContent: Add more information such as the purposes of the classifications, the marketing campaign, the evaluation or let the AI choose it itself.

confirm.description: Start classifying {totalCustomer} customer? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.title: Classification - Confirm?
confirm.warning:
We will utilize the following data for customer classification: customer number, order count, last order date, total order amount, last login, and first login.

Once the customer classification process starts, old AI generated labels tags will be removed and overwritten by newly generated labels.

notificationModal.messageBeforeTabLeave: The classification is being processed. If you close the tab, not all changes may be applied.

process.description: Your customer list is being classified. Please wait!

swag-customer-classification.tagWarning: Keep in mind that the specific conditions for each tag may vary depending on your business and industry, so it's important to adjust the conditions accordingly to ensure accurate classification.
